name: Project Bullet
description:
Project Bullet is a local multiplayer, twin-stick-shooter made in UE4 as a university project. Players control a ship with the aim to shoot down the other players. The player with the most hits scored at the end of the game wins!

The game can is playable with keyboard or controller, but controller is recommended.

Note: Due to Unreal Engine 4’s first keyboard and controller both being recognised as player 1, it is recommended to play with only controllers.
